title: PLEASE BUFF SINGED
body:
DEAR RIOT,
                   Please buff singed... he is a fun champ to play but he needs abit more utility to match and cope with the other top laners

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for help and support with technical issues with the game, you'd be better off posting this in [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy).
